ComputeNode ComputeNode Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Batch
Assembly:
Azure.Batch.dll

Summarizes the state of a compute node.

Edit

In this Article

public class ComputeNode : IRefreshable, IInheritedBehaviors, IPropertyMetadata, IModifiable, IReadOnlyPublic Class ComputeNode
    Implements IRefreshable, IInheritedBehaviors, IPropertyMetadata, IModifiable, IReadOnly

AffinityId AffinityId

Edit

Gets an opaque string that contains information about the location of the compute node.

public string AffinityId { get; }Public ReadOnly Property AffinityId As String
Value
String String

AllocationTime AllocationTime

Edit

Gets the time at which this compute node was allocated to the pool.

public DateTime? AllocationTime { get; }Public ReadOnly Property AllocationTime As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

CertificateReferences CertificateReferences

Edit

Gets the list of certificates installed on this compute node. 

public IReadOnlyList<CertificateReference> CertificateReferences { get; }Public ReadOnly Property CertificateReferences As IReadOnlyList(Of CertificateReference)
Value
IReadOnlyList<CertificateReference> IReadOnlyList(Of CertificateReference)

CustomBehaviors CustomBehaviors

Edit

Gets or sets a list of behaviors that modify or customize requests to the Batch service made via this ComputeNode.

public IList<BatchClientBehavior> CustomBehaviors { get; set; }Public Property CustomBehaviors As IList(Of BatchClientBehavior)
Value
IList<BatchClientBehavior> IList(Of BatchClientBehavior)

Remarks

These behaviors are inherited by child objects.

Modifications are applied in the order of the collection. The last write wins.

Errors Errors

Edit

Gets the list of errors that are currently being encountered by the compute node.

Value
IReadOnlyList<ComputeNodeError> IReadOnlyList(Of ComputeNodeError)

Id Id

Edit

Gets the id of compute node.

public string Id { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
Value
String String

IPAddress IPAddress

Edit

Gets the IP address associated with the compute node.

public string IPAddress { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IPAddress As String
Value
String String

LastBootTime LastBootTime

Edit

Gets the time at which the compute node was started.

public DateTime? LastBootTime { get; }Public ReadOnly Property LastBootTime As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

RecentTasks RecentTasks

Edit

Gets the execution information for the most recent tasks that ran on this compute node. Note that this element is only returned if at least one task was run on this compute node since the time it was assigned to its current pool.

public IReadOnlyList<TaskInformation> RecentTasks { get; }Public ReadOnly Property RecentTasks As IReadOnlyList(Of TaskInformation)
Value
IReadOnlyList<TaskInformation> IReadOnlyList(Of TaskInformation)

RunningTasksCount RunningTasksCount

Edit

Gets the total number of currently running tasks on the compute node. This includes Job Preparation, Job Release, and Job Manager tasks, but not the pool start task.

public int ? RunningTasksCount { get; }Public ReadOnly Property RunningTasksCount As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

SchedulingState SchedulingState

Edit

Gets whether the node is available for task scheduling.

public SchedulingState? SchedulingState { get; }Public ReadOnly Property SchedulingState As SchedulingState?
Value
Nullable<SchedulingState> Nullable(Of SchedulingState)

StartTask StartTask

Edit

Gets the start task associated with all compute nodes in this pool.

public StartTask StartTask { get; }Public ReadOnly Property StartTask As StartTask
Value
StartTask StartTask

StartTaskInformation StartTaskInformation

Edit

Gets the detailed runtime information of the start task, including current state, error details, exit code, start time, end time, etc.

public StartTaskInformation StartTaskInformation { get; }Public ReadOnly Property StartTaskInformation As StartTaskInformation
Value
StartTaskInformation StartTaskInformation

State State

Edit

Gets the current state of the compute node.

public ComputeNodeState? State { get; }Public ReadOnly Property State As ComputeNodeState?
Value
Nullable<ComputeNodeState> Nullable(Of ComputeNodeState)

StateTransitionTime StateTransitionTime

Edit

Gets the time at which the compute node entered the current state.

public DateTime? StateTransitionTime { get; }Public ReadOnly Property StateTransitionTime As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

TotalTasksRun TotalTasksRun

Edit

Gets the number of tasks that have been run on this compute node from the time it was allocated to this pool. This includes Job Preparation, Job Release, and Job Manager tasks, but not the pool start task.

public int ? TotalTasksRun { get; }Public ReadOnly Property TotalTasksRun As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

TotalTasksSucceeded TotalTasksSucceeded

Edit

Gets the total number of tasks which completed successfully (with exitCode 0) on the compute node. This includes Job Preparation, Job Release, and Job Manager tasks, but not the pool start task.

public int ? TotalTasksSucceeded { get; }Public ReadOnly Property TotalTasksSucceeded As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

Url Url

Edit

Gets the URL of compute node.

public string Url { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Url As String
Value
String String

VirtualMachineSize VirtualMachineSize

Edit

Gets the size of the virtual machine hosting the compute node.

public string VirtualMachineSize { get; }Public ReadOnly Property VirtualMachineSize As String
Value
String String

DisableScheduling(Nullable<DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption>, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>) DisableScheduling(Nullable(Of DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption), IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

Edit

Disables task scheduling on the compute node.

public void DisableScheduling(DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption? disableComputeNodeSchedulingOption, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public Sub DisableScheduling(disableComputeNodeSchedulingOption As DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption?, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing)
Parameters
disableComputeNodeSchedulingOption
Nullable<DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption> Nullable(Of DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption)

Specifies what to do with currently running tasks. The default is Requeue.

additionalBehaviors
IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied to the Batch service request after the CustomBehaviors.

Remarks

This is a blocking operation. For a non-blocking equivalent, see DisableSchedulingAsync(Nullable<DisableComputeNodeSchedulingOption>, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>, CancellationToken).

GetRemoteLoginSettings(IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>) GetRemoteLoginSettings(IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

Edit

Gets the settings required for remote login to a compute node.

public RemoteLoginSettings GetRemoteLoginSettings(IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public Function GetRemoteLoginSettings(additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing) As RemoteLoginSettings
Parameters
additionalBehaviors
IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied to the Batch service request after the CustomBehaviors.

Returns
RemoteLoginSettings RemoteLoginSettings

Remarks

This is a blocking operation. For a non-blocking equivalent, see GetRemoteLoginSettingsAsync(IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>, CancellationToken).

This method can be invoked only if the pool is created with a VirtualMachineConfiguration property. If this method is invoked on pools created with CloudServiceConfiguration, then Batch service returns 409 (Conflict). For pools with a CloudServiceConfiguration property, one of the GetRDPFileAsync/GetRDPFile methods must be used.

GetRemoteLoginSettingsAsync(IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>, CancellationToken) GetRemoteLoginSettingsAsync(IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior), CancellationToken)

Edit

Gets the settings required for remote login to a compute node.

public Task<RemoteLoginSettings> GetRemoteLoginSettingsAsync(IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Public Function GetRemoteLoginSettingsAsync(additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of RemoteLoginSettings)
Parameters
additionalBehaviors
IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied to the Batch service request after the CustomBehaviors.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken for controlling the lifetime of the asynchronous operation.

Returns
Task<RemoteLoginSettings> Task(Of RemoteLoginSettings)

A Task that represents the asynchronous operation.

Remarks

The get remote login settings operation runs asynchronously.

This method can be invoked only if the pool is created with a VirtualMachineConfiguration property. If this method is invoked on pools created with CloudServiceConfiguration, then Batch service returns 409 (Conflict). For pools with a CloudServiceConfiguration property, one of the GetRDPFileAsync/GetRDPFile methods must be used.

ListNodeFiles(Nullable<Boolean>, DetailLevel, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>) ListNodeFiles(Nullable(Of Boolean), DetailLevel, IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

Edit

Exposes synchronous and asynchronous enumeration of the files for the node.

public IPagedEnumerable<NodeFile> ListNodeFiles(bool ? recursive = null, DetailLevel detailLevel = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public Function ListNodeFiles(recursive As Boolean? = Nothing, detailLevel As DetailLevel = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing) As IPagedEnumerable(Of NodeFile)
Parameters
recursive
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

If true, performs a recursive list of all files of the node. If false, returns only the files at the node directory root.

detailLevel
DetailLevel DetailLevel

Controls the detail level of the data returned by a call to the Azure Batch Service.

additionalBehaviors
IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object and after the behavior implementing the DetailLevel.

Returns
IPagedEnumerable<NodeFile> IPagedEnumerable(Of NodeFile)

An instance of IPagedEnumerable that can be used to enumerate objects using either synchronous or asynchronous patterns.
